To reproduce:
1) run the built in Thailand scenario by double clicking on the scenario in the scenario view
2) reset the Thailand scenario while it is running
3) The error log will have the following exception.

Dan,
I tried this several ways and could not generate the exception. Which locations exactly were you monitoring in Thailand when you say it? Did you see it after the fix to containment?

This is definitely a bug, it's easy to reproduce (at least on my machine) by resetting Thailand and now Japan, and I suspect any scenario.  The fact that it doesn't happen on your machine is interesting data, something is different.  Hypothesis?

Created an attachment (id=82500)
reset data patch

reset data patch
Dan, I can reproduce the bug. The attached patch should resolve this bug. Thank you.
